requirement.topic: XmlBlaster provides a facility to record all message transfers with the possibility to play back this flow in slow/fast motion
requirement.description: The class InvocationRecorder can be plugged into a client or the server, to follow all CORBA/RMI/XmlRpc method invocations with exact timestamp. Every invocation is stored and may be later played back. The recorder is activated when a Java client uses the fail save xmlblaster access mode -> see XmlBlasterConnection.initFailSave()
